The researcher, say that I will not tell me one of God, if I want me to be miserable, and I will not find from it without it, so that it is just a mode And the origin of the entry from the one and the meant is a refuge that is left to him and sought: It is a name of a place, and it is a source of export, and this is what was said by Bayan for his miracle, peace and blessings be upon him.It was said in the words, and he said, and they said, leave what you call for and we will tell you.It is upon him that I will leave them for you, so he said that I will not tell me, etc.
